Information.title: Language support
Information.message: Qwotables' possibility of changing the language is yet to be implemented. Until this is done, Qwotables' quotes and wisdom will be in English. However, since the text in the app, that is not to be parsed in a json, is already translated into German, the application will show German text when your device's language is German

Information.title: No quotes
Information.message: Due to a few changes on how Qwotable displays quotes in the future, I made some changes to the file, the quotes are getting parsed from. Pwease excuse that until the next update, Qwotable can't display any quotes.
